comments.body: Is this a merge issue? I think this line should be `replicas: 3`

If you view the file it looks fine https://github.com/janetkuo/kubernetes/blob/automated-cherry-pick-of-%2323408-upstream-release-1.2/examples/guestbook/all-in-one/frontend.yaml

I think it's github rendering issue?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@  # this replicas value is default
  # modify it according to your case
  replicas: 3
  # selector can be applied automatically
  # from the labels in the pod template if not set
